ModMetaData.name: Glitter Tech
ModMetaData.author: Xavior
ModMetaData.description: (Unoffical Version for 1.3) GlitterTech adds a ton of shiny new and futuristic items found on the richer developed Glitter worlds. But, this expensive and illegal tech attracts attention of Glitter world Commandos. Can not be subscribed to both mods. Original Mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725576127&searchtext=gliter+tech Pulled and updated from: https://github.com/sam23694/GlitterTech/tree/1.0.2059
